homeFAQ.title: Frequently Asked Questions
homeFAQ.subtitle: Everything you need to know about Jaydai
homeFAQ.ctaPrompt: Still have questions? We're here to help.

questions.question: What is Jaydai and how does it work?
questions.answer: Jaydai is a Chrome extension that enhances your ChatGPT experience by providing a library of expert prompts organized by topic. It allows you to save custom prompts for instant access and provides detailed analytics on your usage. With just one click, you can access our ecosystem designed to optimize your interactions with ChatGPT for both professional and personal projects.

questions.question: Is Jaydai free to use?
questions.answer: Yes, Jaydai offers a free version that includes access to our basic prompt library and template saving features. We also offer premium plans for individuals and teams that include additional features such as advanced analytics, unlimited template storage, and priority support.

questions.question: How do I install the Jaydai Chrome extension?
questions.answer: Installing Jaydai is simple. Just visit the Chrome Web Store, search for 'Jaydai', and click 'Add to Chrome'. Once installed, you'll see the Jaydai icon in your browser toolbar. Click on it to start using our prompt library and templates with ChatGPT.

questions.question: Can I create and save my own prompt templates?
questions.answer: Absolutely! Jaydai allows you to create, save, and organize your own custom prompt templates. This feature helps you save time when working on different projects that require similar AI interactions. You can categorize your templates, edit them anytime, and access them with just one click.

questions.question: What kind of analytics does Jaydai provide?
questions.answer: Jaydai provides detailed analytics on your AI usage, including the number of prompts used, time saved, energy footprint, and effectiveness of different prompt types. These insights help you understand your interaction patterns and optimize your AI workflow for better results.

questions.question: Is there an enterprise version available for teams?
questions.answer: Yes, we offer an enterprise version that allows your entire team to share a customized prompt bank for your specific business use cases. The enterprise plan includes team management features, shared templates, usage analytics across the team, and dedicated support.

privacy.title: Privacy Policy
privacy.content:
Jaydai Privacy Policy

1. Introduction

Welcome to Jaydai ("we," "our," or "us"). We respect your privacy and are committed to protecting your personal data. This privacy policy explains how we collect, use, and safeguard your information when you use our Chrome extension.

2. Data We Collect

Jaydai collects and processes the following categories of personal data:

2.1 Account Information

  • 📧 Email address
  • 👤 Name
  • 🔑 Authentication tokens

2.2 User Activity Data

  • 💬 AI conversation patterns
  • 📊 Template usage statistics
  • ⚡ Energy consumption metrics
  • 📈 Efficiency scores

2.3 User-Generated Content

  • 📝 Custom templates created by users
  • 📁 Folder structures and organization preferences

2.4 Website Content

  • 🤖 Content from supported AI platforms necessary for providing template suggestions
  • 📑 AI conversation content needed for analytics

3. How We Use Your Data

We use your personal data for the following purposes:

  • ⚙️ To provide and maintain our service
    Including user authentication, saving your preferences, and delivering core functionality
  • 🔧 To improve our service
    Analyzing usage patterns to enhance features and performance
  • 🎯 To personalize your experience
    Adapting to your communication style and offering suggestions based on your usage patterns
  • ✉️ To communicate with you
    Sending notifications about updates or changes to our service

4. Data Storage and Security

  • 🔒 User data is stored securely using industry-standard encryption
  • 💻 We process information locally whenever possible to minimize data transmission
  • 🛡️ Authentication tokens are stored securely within Chrome's protected storage
  • 🔐 We implement appropriate technical and organizational measures to protect your personal data

5. Data Sharing

We do not sell, trade, or rent your personal data to third parties. We may share your data in the following limited circumstances:

  • 🤝 With service providers who help us deliver our services (such as cloud hosting providers)
  • ⚖️ If required by law or to respond to legal process
  • 🛑 To protect our rights, privacy, safety, or property

6. Your Rights

Depending on your location, you may have the following rights regarding your personal data:

  • 👁️ Access your personal data
  • ✏️ Correct inaccurate or incomplete data
  • 🗑️ Delete your personal data
  • 🛑 Restrict or object to processing of your data
  • 📤 Data portability
  • ↩️ Withdraw consent

To exercise these rights, please contact us at contact@jayd.ai.

7. Retention

We retain your personal data only for as long as necessary to fulfill the purposes outlined in this policy, unless a longer retention period is required or permitted by law.

8. Children's Privacy

Our service is not directed to children under 16. We do not knowingly collect personal data from children under 16. If we learn we have collected personal data from a child under 16, we will delete that information.

9. Changes to This Policy

We may update this privacy policy from time to time. We will notify you of any changes by posting the new privacy policy on this page and updating the "Last Updated" date.

10. Contact Us

If you have any questions about this privacy policy, please contact us at:

📧 Email: contact@jayd.ai

🏢 Address: 75 ter avenue de Wagram, 75017 Paris, France

termsOfService.title: Terms of Service
termsOfService.content:
Terms of Use for the JAYDAI Extension

1. Introduction to the JAYDAI Extension

The JAYDAI extension is a tool offered by ARCHIMIND (hereinafter "we", "our", "the company"), registered with the Paris Trade and Companies Register under number 980 623 623, with its headquarters located at 75 ter avenue de Wagram, 75017 Paris, France. JAYDAI aims to assist users in their use of ChatGPT by providing tools to optimize their experience with artificial intelligence.

2. Acceptance of Terms

By installing and using the JAYDAI extension, you agree to be bound by these Terms of Use. If you do not accept these terms, please do not install or use the extension.

3. Features of the Extension

The JAYDAI extension offers the following features:

Access to a prompt library: The extension provides direct access to a library of prompts when opening ChatGPT, to maximize the use of the tool.

Real-time usage data visualization: The extension provides real-time statistics on the user's use of ChatGPT, including the number of messages sent, the number of conversations, and the associated energy consumption.

Email summary: A summary is sent to the user's email address on a weekly basis. This summary includes:

  • A recap of the user's usage over the past week and a comparison with previous usage.
  • An evaluation of the prompts sent with a score and advice on how to improve prompt quality.
  • An analysis of the skills the user has delegated to artificial intelligence, with suggestions on fundamental skills not to forget.

4. Data Collection and Processing

4.1 Data Collected

When using the extension, we collect the following data:

  • The prompts sent to ChatGPT by the user
  • The responses generated by ChatGPT in response to these prompts
  • The user's email address (for sending the weekly summary)
  • Usage data generated by interaction with ChatGPT (number of messages, number of conversations, etc.)

4.2 Purpose of Processing

This data is collected for the purpose of:

  • Analyzing and improving the user experience
  • Providing reliable and high-value information
  • Offering recommendations to improve prompts
  • Analyzing the skills used by AI
  • Enabling the sending of personalized weekly summaries

4.3 Legal Basis for Processing

The processing of data is carried out on the basis of your consent, which you give by installing and using the extension.

4.4 Data Retention Period

The collected data is retained for the time necessary to fulfill the purposes for which it was collected, including providing the services offered by the extension and improving your user experience. We regularly review the data we hold and securely delete it when it is no longer necessary for the stated purposes or when you request its deletion, unless there is a legal obligation to retain it.

4.5 Data Security

We implement appropriate technical and organizational measures to protect your data against any loss, unauthorized access, disclosure, alteration, or destruction.

4.6 No Commercial Exploitation

We commit not to financially exploit this data and to ensure its security. No personal user data is shared with third parties for commercial purposes.

5. User Consent

By installing and using this extension, you expressly agree that we have access to certain information related to your ChatGPT profile. This notably includes the prompts sent to ChatGPT as well as the responses generated.

For more information on how ChatGPT handles personal data, you are invited to consult the Terms of Use of ChatGPT and OpenAI's Privacy Policy.

6. Your Rights Regarding Your Data

In accordance with the General Data Protection Regulation (GDPR), you have the following rights regarding your personal data:

  • Right of access
  • Right to rectification
  • Right to erasure (right to be forgotten)
  • Right to restriction of processing
  • Right to data portability
  • Right to object

To exercise these rights, you can contact us at the following address: jean-baptiste@jayd.ai

7. Limitation of Liability

The JAYDAI extension is provided "as is" and we cannot be held responsible for malfunctions or service interruptions that may occur during its use. We strive to keep the extension in good working order, but errors or interruptions may occur.

We are not responsible for failures or disruptions of ChatGPT or any other third-party service on which our extension relies.

8. Intellectual Property

All intellectual property rights relating to the JAYDAI extension, including the source code, design, logos, and other associated elements, are the exclusive property of JAYDAI. No license is granted to the user, except for the use of the extension within the framework provided by these Terms of Use.

9. Uninstallation

You can uninstall the extension at any time by following the standard Chrome extension uninstallation procedure. Uninstalling the extension does not automatically result in the deletion of data already collected. To request the deletion of your data, please contact us at the address indicated in the "Your Rights Regarding Your Data" section.

10. Modifications to the Terms of Use

We reserve the right to modify these Terms of Use at any time. In case of substantial modification, the updated version of the Terms will be available on our website, and you will be informed by notification within the extension or by any other appropriate means of communication. Your continued use of the extension after the publication of the modified Terms constitutes your acceptance of these modifications.

11. Applicable Law and Disputes

These Terms of Use are governed by French law. In the event of a dispute relating to the interpretation or execution of the Terms, the parties undertake to attempt to resolve the dispute amicably. Failing agreement within a period of 30 days, the dispute will be submitted to the competent jurisdictions of the Paris court.

12. Contact

For any questions regarding these Terms of Use or the JAYDAI extension, you can contact us at the following address: jean-baptiste@jayd.ai
